message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and unparalleled quality. We believe its value far exceeds $12000. Considering our commitment to excellence and the unique benefits this product offers, I would like to extend an initial offer of $15000. I understand that each buyer may perceive value differently, and I'm open to discussing further to ensure we find a mutually beneficial arrangement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I believe this is a fair price considering the features and quality you mentioned. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
